messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to mildly fucked station 13. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Supply Department

Cargo: Seems we've ordered doubles of our department resupply packages this month. Can we send them to you?

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Good afternoon crew!! this is your Head of Security speaking. We here at security value your time and patience, also disabilities. We are excited to inform you we are all on strike here at security, feel free to come up and join us! We are striking for the captain's unequal treatment of disabled crew. Like our beloved warden. We encourge you to join us, as the Union approved it prior. Have a nice day!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The verticaly cahllenged warden getsss equal rightsss even if he hasss an inability to ussse ssstairsss or walk he isss to be treated with the utmossst care that you would give to other crew wich to be fair aint alot however id like to asssk the hosss return my all acsssesss id for massscarading a coo

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 7 viral biohazard aboard mildly fucked station 13. All personnel must contain the outbreak.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on scans from our long-range sensors, we believe that one of the station's [REDACTED] has developed command level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.
